data.title: Pusser's Rum, British Navy, Guyana, 750ml
data.meta_description: Pusser’s Blue Label is a Royal Navy style rum inspired by the Admiralty’s blending recipe last used when the Royal Navy discontinued its daily ration on 31 July 1970. The color is a clear, dark amber. On the nose you will find classic Demerara sugar, molasses, dried fruits, island spices, and caramel. The body is full,
data.text:
Pusser’s Blue Label is a Royal Navy style rum inspired by the Admiralty’s blending recipe last used when the Royal Navy discontinued its daily ration on 31 July 1970.

The color is a clear, dark amber. On the nose you will find classic Demerara sugar, molasses, dried fruits, island spices, and caramel. The body is full, round and perfect for cocktails. Finishes long with a mild spicy burn.
